Candidate :  Taheni Brahmia

CARE ER SUMMARY  
 
2013 – date Henkel  
 
2020 - date 
Position: GCC MARKETING MANAGER - HENKEL LAUNDRY AND HOME CARE  
After gaining a local & MEA Regional experience for more than 8 years, she moved to the GCC team 
handling leading premium Brand Persil as well as the digital marketing champion for the GCC region . 
Her main tasks include the following:  
• Developing and deploying the marketing stra tegy for Persil powder to regrow the category in 
GCC  
• Set the sales plan and target MS of the brand and lead the project to deliver the KPI’S • 
Developing business plans for new launches in GCC  
• Managing the portfolio including the analysis of the monthl y KPIs  
• Digitalization of the brand/ team: work closely with the digital agency to deploy the social media 
strategy as well as developing a tailor made digital ecosystem fitting the GCC consumer  
• Boost the brand on E -commerce, set the sales target / prom otional strategy for the online 
shopping and collaborate with the main Key accounts to feature the brand and boost the sales  
• Monthly tracking of the whole digital strategy and adjustment of the plan to fit the agile and 
dynamic market  
• Manage the intern al communication between the business team and 5 different functions  
• Manage the team and stakeholders in all department and countries to deliver on the main 
targets , with excellence in execution  
 
2018 – present  
 Position: MEA Regional MARKETING MANAGER - HENKEL LAUNDRY AND HOME  CARE  
After gaining a local experience for more than 5 years, she moved to the Regional Team handling 
leading premium Category (Persil Brand ) on top of the business development responsibility for North 
African countries . Her main tasks include the followi ng: 
• Developing and deploying the regional Marketing strategies aligning between the strategic 
business unit in the headquarters and the countries within the region  
• Handling strategic positioning of brands, optimizing the portfolio and reducing complexi ty 
• Developing business plans for new launches in the region  
• Managing the portfolio including the analysis of the monthly KPIs  
• Regional digital strategy development for MEA and adaptation of the main global learnings to 
upskill the LP category in Midd le east and Africa  Manage the internal communication between 
the business team and 5 different functions  
• Manage the team and stakeholders in all departments and countries to deliver on the main 
targets, with excellence in execution  
 
2016 – 2018  
Position: BRAND MANAGER, HEN KEL TUNISIA  
Passionately working in Marketing Department and collaborating closely with sales , Trade Marketing, 
Supply Chain and R&D departments concerning the realization of the goals and strategies of laundry 
Brands.  Her main tasks include the followi ng: 
• Managing leading brands in Home Care, and laundry : Pril, Dixan , Nadhif , General , as well as 
insecticide brand : COMBAT  
• Close coordination of product innovation and launch activities with Regional Team, internal 
departments and external agencie s (Media , Creative and Digital )  
• Monitoring Brand performance through Sales Reports and Research Data  
• Responsible for launches and line extensions implementation: operating full marketing mix 
activities and steering category's budget.  
• Manage the in ternal communication between the business team and 5 different functions  
• Manage the team and stakeholders in all departments to deliver on the main targets, with 
excellence in execution  
 
2016 – 2016  
Position: JUNIOR BRAND MANAGER , HENKEL TUNISIA  
Looking after 3 brands fro m different categories ( Home Care Pril / Laundry Dixan and Insecticide 
Combat , her main responsibility was the portfolio management of each brand as well as the 
achievement of the business goals on top lines and bottom lines , as well as the execution of t he brand 
activations  
 
2013 – 2015  
Position: ASSISTANT BRAND MANAGER, HENKEL TUNISIA  
Assisting the marketing director in leading 2 main brands in Henkel TUNISIA ( Pril and Dixan ). Her main 
tasks :  
• Execution of the brand master plan  
• Work closely with market research agencies and data analysis for better understanding of the 
brand status ( Familiar with Nielsen Platform ) 
• Ensure excellent Artwork development and its conformity with brands standa rds and guidelines  
• Monitor and track brand KPI s 
 
 
 COMMENT  
 
Motivated and enthusiastic Marketer, a sparkling mix that allows me to be passionate about her brands 
and pr ojects . 
 
For further information please contact Julie Smith  on 01695 5 70 696  or email Julie. smith @johnston -
vere.co.uk
